main event: A UFO was observed by at least 25 residents in Cincinnati, Ohio on June 24, 1953, for a duration of 15 seconds.
interesting points: The object was reported to change colors from yellow-white to brilliant red and then to brilliant blue.,Witnesses described the object as being the size of a medium automobile from their viewpoint.,The object emitted a whining noise as it changed altitude.,The sighting resulted in a conclusion of an astronomical event., The reported object was estimated to be 10,000 feet away.
